name: Twitch / Twitch.tv Dark Chat (New Fix April 2014)
description: Dark chat style fix for pretty much all currently installed dark twitch themes. Usable along side an installed dark theme with a broken dark chat.
additional_info:
Dark chat style fix for pretty much all currently installed dark twitch themes. Usable along side an installed dark theme with a broken dark chat.

Fixed for people not logged-in.

Darkened the viewer list to match the rest of the chat theme.
